title: Can i get 280 chaos tokens with out paying rp ?

replies.body: Some players have done the math for us, and gathered that you were able to get 280 tokens from daily missions alone (these missions do not require spending RP). As far as I've been able to calculate, you can definitely get the special icon that activates the border without having to spend RP. However, you do need to purchase the Nightbringer Yasuo skin in order to have the border applied.
